Key Match Events: Dhananjaya de Silva hit a walk-off grand slam in the ninth inning
Mujeeb Ur Rahman picked up two early wickets but Afghanistan struggled to maintain momentum
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan's captain Mohammad Nabi said they lost their last two games and needed to play at their best.
Sri Lanka's captain Dasun Shanaka praised Dhananjaya de Silva and credited the team's consistency.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dhananjaya de Silva scored 66 runs off 42 balls, securing the win with a six-wicket performance.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman conceded 40 runs at 5 wickets with 8 economy in the last 5 overs.
Others: Afghanistan is now out of the semi-final race.
Sri Lanka won by 6 wickets with 9 balls remaining.
